0.6.notes: Adds ThemeAPI for reading the active theme and subscribing to theme changes. Adds SoundsAPI for custom notification sound packs. Adds AgentConfigAPI for plugin-driven agent configuration (skills, templates, instructions, permissions, MCP servers). Extends CommandsAPI with keyboard binding support. Extends NavigationAPI with popOutAgent, toggleSidebar, and toggleAccessoryPanel. Adds orchestrator support to AgentsAPI (listOrchestrators, checkOrchestratorAvailability, orchestrator/freeAgentMode options on runQuick). Adds agents.free-agent-mode permission.
